WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
      I recently tried to use the PHPWord to fill my docx templates.PHP Word works fine when used in a  template with ordinary fields. (like the one given in Examples) but it has issues when I try to do it on a Microsoft Word 2007 docx file template containing "__Mail-Merged field__". It simply doesnt work. It just generates the word file same as template. Please Help. Thank you in advance.
WorkItem.Summary: Does it work with a docx file having "mail-merged" fields?
